entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
